```{.r .cell-code}
library(modeldata)
view(penguins)
```
:::






## Bar chat for comparison






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = species,
             fill = species)) +
  geom_bar(show.legend = F) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(x = "Species",
       y = NULL)+
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](pie_chart_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::






## Obtain counts for penguin species






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pen_sum <- penguins |>
  count(species) |>
  arrange(desc(n))
pen_sum
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
  species       n
  <fct>     <int>
1 Adelie      152
2 Gentoo      124
3 Chinstrap    68
```


:::
:::






## A stacked bar chart






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pen_sum |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = "",
             y = n,
             fill = species)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(fill = "Species",
       x = NULL,
       y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](pie_chart_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::






## A basic pie chart






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pen_sum |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = "",
             y = n,
             fill = species)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_polar("y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(fill = "Species",
       x = NULL,
       y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](pie_chart_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::






## Adding labels to the pie chart






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pen_sum |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = "",
             y = n,
             fill = species)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_polar("y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(fill = "Species",
       x = NULL,
       y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](pie_chart_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pen_sum |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = "",
             y = n,
             fill = species)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(aes(label = paste0(round(n/sum(n)*100, 1), "%")),
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5)) +
  coord_polar("y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(fill = "Species",
       x = NULL,
       y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](pie_chart_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggrepel)

pen_sum |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = "",
             y = n,
             fill = species)) +
  geom_col(width = 1) +
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = paste0(round(n/sum(n)*100, 1), "%")),
                   position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5),
                   force_pull = 0.5,
                   show.legend = FALSE) +
  coord_polar("y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  labs(fill = "Species",
       x = NULL,
       y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](pie_chart_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

```{.r .cell-code}

  coord_polar("y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
```
